scripts.setup:lab: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const src='teoria-sintergica/brain-prototype/frontend/public/models/brain';const dest='static/models/brain';if(!fs.existsSync(dest)&&fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync('static/models',{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('✅ Brain model copied')}else{console.log('ℹ️ Already exists or source not found')}"
